name: Running Bread Escape
description:
FUNNY AND CAPTIVATING GAME FOR KIDS AND ADULTS

Just RUN as FAST as you can!
Overcome all traps and obstacles.
Become the WINNER in the most HILARIOUS runner.

√ BECOME A CHARISMATIC CUTIE
Choose your character - bread or baguette? brown or white?

√ OVERCOME LOTS OF AMUSING OBSTACLES
Knives, waffle iron, stove burner, water tap, etc.

√ MAKE YOUR CHARACTER STYLISH
Collect coins to get a new style: bacon, sausage, olive, cheese

√ WIN 20 BREATHTAKING LEVELS
Enjoy the challenge - let's complete them all.

Start the FUNNIEST adventures in the CRAZY kitchen RIGHT NOW!
